happy_paths.name: Inquiry to Successful Account Setup
steps: Customer asks for information about the x12 leveraged account.
Agent provides a detailed explanation of the product, including rules, benefits, and the 10% drawdown rule.
Customer asks clarifying questions about minimum deposits, rules, and withdrawals.
Agent answers questions and provides the registration link.
Customer registers and verifies their account.
Agent guides the customer on how to make a deposit.
Agent instructs the customer on how to use the 'Amplify' feature to apply the x12 leverage.
Agent provides instructions to link the account to the MT5 platform (Server: TMFINANCIALS).
Customer confirms the account is set up and ready to trade.

happy_paths.name: Successful Withdrawal Process
steps: Customer asks how to withdraw profits.
Agent explains the process: transfer funds from the trading account to the main wallet via the 'Amplify' section.
Agent provides a help link with detailed withdrawal instructions.
Customer follows the steps and successfully initiates a withdrawal to their crypto wallet.
Agent congratulates the customer on their profit.

deviations.name: Deposit Failure or Issue
deviations.description: Customer's attempt to deposit funds fails or does not reflect in their wallet. This is often due to credit/debit card rejections, high fees prompting hesitation, or confusion with cryptocurrency transfers.
deviations.trigger: Customer states their deposit was rejected, they see a high commission fee, or the deposited funds are not appearing in their account.

deviations.name: Inexperienced User / Beginner
deviations.description: Customer reveals they have little or no trading experience, asking for signals, guidance, or stating they are new. The agent then pivots from selling the leveraged account to recommending an educational academy.
deviations.trigger: Customer asks 'who will help me trade?', 'do you provide signals?', or states 'I'm new to this'.

deviations.name: Login or Registration Problem
deviations.description: Customer is unable to log in to the client portal or complete their registration. This often involves incorrect password errors even after a reset, or the system not accepting their credentials.
deviations.trigger: Customer states 'I can't log in', 'my password isn't working', or sends a screenshot of a login error.

deviations.name: Post-Setup Trading Problem
deviations.description: After successfully setting up and funding their account, the customer is unable to execute trades on the MT5 platform. The most common cause is using the wrong asset symbol (e.g., 'XAUUSD' instead of 'XAUUSD.f').
deviations.trigger: Customer reports 'trade is disabled', 'invalid volume', or 'money insufficient' errors when trying to place a trade.

deviations.name: Withdrawal Delay
deviations.description: Customer has initiated a withdrawal, but the funds have not arrived in their crypto wallet after several hours. The agent typically escalates this to the support team.
deviations.trigger: Customer asks 'where is my withdrawal?' or states that the withdrawal they made yesterday has not arrived.

deviations.name: Off-Topic or Wrong Number
deviations.description: The customer's message is irrelevant, appears to be for a different person/company, or is spam/inappropriate content.
deviations.trigger: Messages like 'Estas equivocado' (You're mistaken), personal greetings to someone else, or random URLs.
